channel.title: Shitty server
channel.description:
Server times out constantly. Get a new one.
Connection Problems Sorry, SMF was unable to connect to the database. This may be caused by the server being busy. Please try again later.

item.title: Shitty server
item.dc:creator: @ThatOneServer Mike_
item.description:
@ThatOneServer wrote:

N0 tlkn abot srvs on mpristebest.

Go to mprscape.org.

phpbb is a massive fail. VB would be better.

SMF is fine once you rewrite the ban system.

Read full topic

item.title: Shitty server
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

BAsh(CntLgn):

Mopar: would it help to change the forum software? I’m sure its possible to import the database into another format.

The only problem with SMF is the banning system, from what I can tell whenever bans are changed/added it rebuilds the cache which is by now massive and overloads the server. When I get a spare hour or two I am going to rewrite the ban system to ban IPs with route/iptables, I just haven’t gotten around to it yet.

There are scripts for converting the database to another forum, but then I have to manually mod everything I have modded with this setup which is A LOT of stuff. If I was going to convert It would be to vB or PunBB, never phpbb.

Read full topic

item.description:
@tL wrote:

The only reason i buy hosting in the uk is because of the support, and so far the service i have had is 99% never, ever had any problems with them. It would make sense for moparisthebest to keep his hosting in america since the majority of this sites traffic comes from there

Anyway, this is not really a server problem pretty sure its a smf problem due to the bloated database.
